title._content: Untitled - caption: 'View and plans of the Roman baths at Bath, co. Somerset; made after the site was discovered when the old priory was demolished in 1755. The view shows the remains of the baths at the south side of Bath Abbey'

tag.author: 12403504@N02

description._content: ID: A80066-93 Title: Untitled. Illustrator: "Hoare, William (William Hoare)" Provenance: Bath, co. Somerset; 1762 Caption: View and plans of the Roman baths at Bath, co. Somerset; made after the site was discovered when the old priory was demolished in 1755. The view shows the remains of the baths at the south side of Bath Abbey Language: English Source identifier: Add. 21577 B British Library Shelfmark: Add. 21577 B If you wish to purchase a high quality copy of this image, please place an order at Images Online imagesonline.bl.uk.
